document.full_text: roger federer and rafael nadal have met in more grand slam finals than any other two men, but their french open matchup is their first since 2009.
document.title: after two-year break, a special grand slam rivalry is renewed
lines_and_colors: roger federer and rafael nadal have met in more grand slam finals than any other two men, but their french open matchup is their first since 2009.
